body.p: The Fourth Kentucky Mounted Infantry (Confederate) was organized on September 13th, 1861 at Camp Burnett in Montgomery County, Tennessee. Sent to join Confederate General Simon Bolivar Buckner's forces at Bowling Green, late September or early October 1861.Participated in the battle of Shiloh, April 1862, the battle at Baton Rogue, Louisiana on August 5th, 1862. Joined General Bragg's army in time to participate in Battle of Murfreesboro, TN, and Chickamauga.
